PATIENT_ID: TEST_TRAUMATIC_ARREST_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-06 16:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-06 16:05:00
Category I activation for 19-year-old male. Traumatic cardiac arrest.
Found unresponsive after motorcycle collision. No pulse on arrival.
Blunt trauma mechanism confirmed.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-06 16:15:00
Patient in traumatic arrest on arrival.
EMS report not available. Pre-hospital data not provided.
No field provider handoff documented.
No rhythm strip attached to chart.
No documentation of any procedures performed in field or on arrival.
Team assembled. Evaluation pending complete clinical assessment.
